trans-unit.source: Defines a specialized text run that is used to mark the end of a segment.
trans-unit.target: Define um texto especializado executar, que é utilizado para marcar o fim de um segmento.

trans-unit.source: The TextEndOfSegment ends the scope affected by a preceding <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier> text run.
trans-unit.target: O TextEndOfSegment termina o âmbito afetado por um precedente <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier>texto executar.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"></xref> buffer.
trans-unit.target: O número de carateres a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"> </xref> memória intermédia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"></xref> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"> </xref> memória intermédia de caráter.

trans-unit.source: Gets the character length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"></xref> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a sequência de carateres da <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"> </xref> memória intermédia de caráter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> object that represents the length of the character buffer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>objeto que representa o comprimento da memória intermédia caráter.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of properties shared by every text character of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"></xref> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de propriedades partilhado por cada caráter do texto do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment"> </xref> memória intermédia de caráter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> value that represents the properties shared by every text character.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> </xref> valor que representa as propriedades partilhadas por cada caráter do texto.
